title: Diamond Floral Cascade Haaram - A Timeless Telugu Treasure
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Gold weight approximately 35 grams.
features: This exquisite haaram features a delicate cascade of floral motifs, each intricately studded with sparkling CZ stones. The central pendant showcases a cluster of flowers design, reminiscent of traditional Telugu floral patterns. The subtle paisley droplets (Manga Maalai inspired) add a touch of South Indian elegance. A secure and comfortable clasp ensures perfect wear.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold with dazzling clear Cubic Zirconia stones
creating a radiant and luxurious appearance.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also suitable for festive events like Sankranthi and Ugadi. Its versatile design also allows it to be paired with contemporary outfits for formal gatherings.
description: This Haaram blends traditional Telugu design with modern aesthetics, offering a timeless piece that will be cherished for generations. The high-quality craftsmanship and Hyderabadi polish ensure lasting brilliance and durability. The design is lightweight and comfortable, making it perfect for extended wear during celebrations. The CZ stones provide a dazzling sparkle at an accessible price point, allowing you to achieve the look of diamonds without compromising on quality.
